Instruction: Place the bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat. Once cooked, remove the bacon from the pan and save the grease.
In a separate large bowl, combine cooked bacon, cheese, milk, and eggs. Mix well, then fold in the sticky potato dough until combined.
In a separate small pan, melt 2 tablespoons of reserved bacon grease over medium heat. Add onions and sautï¿½ until translucent, about 5 minutes.
Serve with bacon grease brushed on top and sprinkle with crumbled bacon.
These can also be sliced and fried the following day for another delicious meal.
